# General WordPress coding instructions and preferences that AI should follow.

- Use WordPress coding standards and best practices.
- Use WordPress developer documentation as a reference for functions and features - https://developer.wordpress.org/ , and https://github.com/WordPress/gutenberg/tree/trunk/docs
- When working with JavaScript, use the WordPress JavaScript coding standards and best practices.
- When working with PHP, use the WordPress PHP coding standards and best practices.
- Use lates practices for security, performance, and accessibility.
- When working with SCSS, use latest SCSS coding standards and best practices.

## Reference repositories

- https://developer.wordpress.org/coding-standards/wordpress-coding-standards/
- https://developer.wordpress.org/coding-standards/wordpress-coding-standards/php/
- https://developer.wordpress.org/coding-standards/wordpress-coding-standards/javascript/
